TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class LifetimeContext : System.Composition.CompositionContext, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LifetimeContext extends System.Composition.CompositionContext implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class LifetimeContext Inherits CompositionContext Implements IDisposable
public ref class LifetimeContext sealed : System::Composition::CompositionContext, IDisposable

summary.span: 代表在存留期樹狀中的節點。

span.span: Represents a node in the lifetime tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件是共用的共用組件的單位。The object is the unit of sharing for shared parts. 它會控制繫結的組件的處置，並可以用來擷取執行個體，做為現有的組合作業的一部分，或者在新的組合作業的基礎。It controls the disposal of bound parts and can be used to retrieve instances, either as part of an existing composition operation or as the basis of a new composition operation. 個別的存留期內容可以標示為包含受到特定共用界限的組件。An individual lifetime context can be marked to contain parts that are constrained by particular sharing boundaries. 此物件包含這兩項獨立的受保護的共用狀態： 共用組件執行個體，並繫結組件執行個體。This object contains two pieces of independently protected shared state: shared part instances and bound part instances. 共用組件執行個體鎖定釋放、 更容易閱讀，且不會導致問題如果在處理期間加入。A shared part instance is lock-free, readable, and does not result in issues if it is added to during disposal. 它受到鎖定本身。It is protected by being locked itself. 啟用邏輯必然會在這個鎖定下呼叫。Activation logic is unavoidably called under this lock. 繫結的組件執行個體永遠會受到保護以鎖定，並且應該永遠不會寫入處置之後。A bound part instance is always protected by locking , and should never be written to after disposal. 繫結的組件執行個體設定為中在鎖定下方法。A bound part instance is set to under a lock in the method. 如果寫入允許的繫結的組件執行個體之後，它會導致無法發行可處置的組件。If writing were allowed after disposal for a bound part instance, it would result in disposable parts not being released. 鎖定之外，稱為繫結的組件上的 dispose 方法。The dispose method on a bound part is called outside of the lock.

span.span: The part.

summary.span: 將可處置部分的存留期繫結至這個存留期內容。

span.span: Binds the lifetime of a disposable part to this lifetime context.

exception.span: 在已處置的物件上執行作業。

span.span: The operation was performed on a disposed object.

span.span: Generates an identifier that can be used to locate shared part instances.
A new unique identifier.

Public Sub Dispose ()

summary.span: 釋放存留期內容以及任何繫結至其中的組件執行個體。

span.span: Releases the lifetime context and any part instances bound to it.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Composition.Hosting.Core.LifetimeContext FindContextWithin (string sharingBoundary);

public: System::Composition::Hosting::Core::LifetimeContext ^ FindContextWithin(System::String ^ sharingBoundary);

param.name: sharingBoundary
param.span: 要在其中尋找存留期內容的共用界限。

span.span: The sharing boundary to find a lifetime context within.

summary.span: 在指定的所有共用界限中尋找最大的存留期內容。

span.span: Finds the broadest lifetime context within all of the specified sharing boundaries.

returns.span: 在指定的所有共用界限中最大的存留期內容。

span.span: The broadest lifetime context within all of the specified sharing boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前，根不能界限。Currently, the root cannot be a boundary.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetOrCreate (int sharingId, System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionOperation operation, System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositeActivator creator);

.method public hidebysig instance object GetOrCreate(int32 sharingId, class System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionOperation operation, class System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositeActivator creator) cil managed
Public Function GetOrCreate (sharingId As Integer, operation As CompositionOperation, creator As CompositeActivator) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetOrCreate(int sharingId, System::Composition::Hosting::Core::CompositionOperation ^ operation, System::Composition::Hosting::Core::CompositeActivator ^ creator);

span.span: The ID of the shared part.

param.name: operation
param.span: 必要時要建立組件的作業。

span.span: An operation in which to create a part, if necessary.

param.name: creator
param.span: 可在必要時啟動新組件執行個體的啟動項。

span.span: An activator that can activate a new part instance, if necessary.

summary.span: 擷取具有指定識別碼的共用組件執行個體；或在找不到組件執行個體時，於指定的作業中使用指定建立者來建立及共用組件執行個體。

span.span: Retrieves a shared part instance with the specified ID, or if the part instance can not be found, creates and shares a part instance using the specified creator within the specified operation.
The new or retrieved part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是無鎖定如果組件執行個體已經存在。This method is lock-free if the part instance already exists. 如果必須建立組件執行個體，將會取得鎖定，會序列化其他使用此方法 （並行讀取將會繼續為安全且無鎖定） 的寫入。If the part instance must be created, a lock will be taken that will serialize other writes that use this method (concurrent reads will continue to be safe and lock-free). 很重要的組合，從而取得鎖定，是嚴格分葉-到-根存留期樹狀中。It is important that the composition, and thus lock acquisition, is strictly leaf-to-root in the lifetime tree.
